markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Overpowering Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=1619) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Barreling Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=1605)

</column>

---

You trample your foes as you charge past them. When you use Barreling Charge and successfully move through a creature's space, that creature takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier. If you critically succeed, the creature takes twice this amount of damage and becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the end of your next turn.
name: Overpowering Charge
